definition: to offer (tribute)/to present respectfully (to superior, ancestor, deity etc)/to esteem/to revere/to believe in (a religion)/to wait upon/to accept orders (from superior)
to accompany/to keep sb company/to assist/old variant of 賠|赔[pei2]

sentences.english: I can not participate in your past, your future, I will fight in the end.
sentences.chinese: 你的過去我不能參與，你的未來我奉陪到底。

sentences.english: If they insist on fighting, we will keep them company.
sentences.chinese: 如果他們一定要打，我們將奉陪到底。

sentences.english: "I'm game, " he said, "we'll see who rusts first. "
sentences.chinese: “那好吧，我奉陪”他說“咱們倒看看誰先熬不住。”

sentences.english: She does not enjoy the company of the opposite sex.
If you insist then I'll endure it.
sentences.chinese: 假如你要堅持到底，那麼我也將奉陪。

sentences.english: I am free for you all the time by the way.
sentences.chinese: 順便說一下，只要爲你，我隨時奉陪。

sentences.english: If conservatives in Congress want to enter the case to argue otherwise, so be it.
sentences.chinese: 如果國會議員裏的保守派還要討論，那就奉陪。

sentences.english: The lady seldom has this pleasure, yet excuse this princess have already had no capacity as alcohol to reserve enterprise with.
sentences.chinese: 夫人難得有此雅興，但恕本公主已無酒量奉陪。

sentences.english: Without you, I would also like to go to work, but also very busy.
sentences.chinese: 恕不奉陪了，明日我還要上班呢，而且還很忙碌呢。

sentences.english: If the right is for it - then Im against it, no matter what.
sentences.chinese: 如果右派是這個觀點，那我就需不奉陪了。

sentences.english: 'I'm happy to step up to the plate if they want to go to court.'
sentences.chinese: 如果他們想提起訴訟，我願意奉陪。

definition: Please do as you wish!/You are welcome to do whatever you like!/Please make yourself at home.
to do as one pleases/to not inconvenience oneself
deference is no substitute for obedience (idiom)/(said to accept sb's request, invitation etc)
pinyin: gong1 jing4 bu4 ru2 cong2 ming4

definition: goodbye (modest formula)/Excuse me, I must leave.
to do sb the honor (of attending etc)/to put in an appearance/to show up
refined and elegant attitude of mind
bring it on!/give me all you got!
you're welcome/don't mention it/no need to stand on ceremony
not to mince words/not to beat about the bush
pinyin: da3 kai1 tian1 chuang1 shuo1 liang4 hua4

definition: let's talk about the unpleasant things first/let's be frank
pinyin: chou3 hua4 shuo1 zai4 qian2 tou5

definition: I appreciate your kindness (conventional reply to turn down an offer)
